sentences.sContent: I took the precaution of clearing out my desk before I left.
sentences.sCn: 为了万全起见我离开前清理了我的桌子。

sentences.sContent: We decided to clear out all the old clothes that we never wear.
sentences.sCn: 我们决定把我们不再穿的旧衣服清除掉。

synos.tran: 走开；把…清出；办理海关出口手续

trans.tranOther: If you clear out a container, room, or house, you make it neat and throw away the things in it that you no longer want
